metadata.title: CVE-2023-50782 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the python-cryptography package. This issue may allow aremote attacker to decrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSAkey exchanges, which may lead to exposure of confidential or sensitivedata.

criterions.comment: python-cryptography package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-01-18').
openssl package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
nodejs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
edk2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
